These books keep skipping forward.  It gets you in suspense, then skips right ahead.  Very frustrating.  I was pretty stoked to get these though. It kind of is a disappointment.  Nice effort though.

Thnx for the Up effort, but book 2 skips plenty about 3 or 4 times during the first 8mins. I think maybe you have some files in different order when you combined them all into 1 file. Although its great for space it actually sucks....bigtime. Its not like i'm going to hear the whole audio in one go. 

When I put it into my mp3 player it takes wayyyyy to long to fast forward to the part that I last stayed. A suggestion...maybe combine the files into 10min files or so.

Are all the books skippy like this? can anyone confirm?

no just the one book skips a few times when i joined all the tracks I messed up the order of 3 2-3min tracks otherwise all other books work just fine sorry my second upload  aint perfect but your all welcome

3 2-3 min tracks?? It skips regularly the first 50 minutes of the first book, I'd say it skips a part EVERY 2-3 minutes, for how long I dont know only listened to 50 min... sounds like it is the same problem on book 2 as well?? anyone know?

VERY DISAPPOINTING - unless you want an incomplete book DON'T DOWNLOAD.. THIS TORRENT SHOULD BE REMOVED. I  downloaded blackwood farm, and as I have read it before I know that these "skips" mentioned by others are sections of the recording that have somehow been removed. METALVEGETAX your intentions were great - my thanks - there are no other Anne Rice audiobooks I can find that have been compiled into single files. But, please check your work before uploading.
